name: Blocky Cars Speed Racer - Underground Highway Reckless Edition
name_original: Blocky Cars Speed Racer - Underground Highway Reckless Edition
description:
Enjoy the endless racing fun with your friend! Get this App!

Steve wants to become a famous racer! Help him to reach his ultimate goal on these blocky roads!

> Play on 30+ pre crafted level on 3 different difficulty
> Build your own race tracks, share with your friends
> Compete your friends
> Share your car configurations
> Upgrade your car
> Win races!

Tons of cool items to unlock in your garage including cars, engines, tires, and chassis to optimize your car; there are hundreds of possible car configurations to test on each track.
